name: Ice battle (itch)
description:
Win ice hockey championship.

How to play:
Keyboard:
Arrow Keys to move, X - throw the puck, C - hit opponent, V - pass,
Space - stop, Q/E - previous/next character, Escape - pause.

Gamepad:
Left stick to move, X - throw the puck, B - hit opponent, Y - pass,
A - stop, Left Bumper/Right Bumper - previous/next character, Start - pause.
